instructions.note: Password is loaded from EMAIL_PASSWORD environment variable
setup_env_file: 1. Create a .env file in the same directory as the script
3. Optionally override other settings with environment variables:
setup_gmail: 1. Enable 2-factor authentication on your Gmail account
2. Go to Google Account settings > Security > App passwords
3. Generate an app password for this script
4. Add the app password to .env file as EMAIL_PASSWORD
